short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to share your entire screen or a part of your screen during a telehealth call.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to share your entire screen or a part of your screen during a telehealth call.

CareVision Solutions provides telehealth applications and services for healthcare providers to use with their patients.  This telehealth platform allows providers and clinical staff to see and interact with patients remotely thus optimizing provider time, patient access and patient outcomes.
